Text.Page:
The Atel Akaad is suspiciously quiet. Even though they've left behind a rearguard, I expected more fight out of them. Something's brewing.

The only way to know is to acquire the scouting reports from the {@LinkCreature:25#2031#devan deathmasters} they left behind. I trust you can forge ahead and find a way to "acquire" them.

These are all the scouting reports? Hmm...here's something. Lok's Curse! This really is the calm before the storm. They're getting ready to stage a full-scale attack. We need reinforcements! This is more than one person can handle. Poke Rendalf with this; maybe he can light a fire.
Get the dross out! More scouting reports! We need all the intelligence we can get.

I'M RIGHT HERE, Culetta! You don't need messengers and official requisitions. Hmph. I'm five meters away.

What's so important that...is this true?

The ossugon warchiefs are gathering all the remaining cultists to attack this redoubt! We can't afford to lose this foothold. I'll call for reinforcements right away.

Thanks for your help, . Say, if you're not busy...
